QueryViewSpec.Name: Rate Increase Appeal Merged Constituents Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Rate Increase Appeal Merged Constituents Query
QueryViewSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: select count(*) as AppealCount, CONSTITUENTID as ID from dbo.constituentappeal where appealid = (select ID from dbo.APPEAL where NAME like '%10555%') group by CONSTITUENTID having count(CONSTITUENTID) > 1
